channel.title: Connect mangoh to GCE cloud server
channel.description: I want to connect mangoh to the GCE hosting server. Although, I have not opted for the conventional GCE hosting server. Instead, I decided to go with the managed [Google cloud web hosting server](https://www.cloudways.com/en/managed-google-compute-engine.php) which is managed by cloudways. As, I don't want to stuck in the management of cloud server. Usually it only take minutes to integrate any application. But, I am a bit concern about mangoh Air vantage with GCE. As, I don't have any clue on how to do it.

item.title: Connect mangoh to GCE cloud server
item.dc:creator: dbeckwith
item.description:
@LindaJackson Have you considered Google Cloud IoT MQTT broker and Cloud Functions? We currently use Cloud Functions and we don’t have to manage servers at all.

Read full topic
item.source: Connect mangoh to GCE cloud server

item.title: Connect mangoh to GCE cloud server
item.dc:creator: LindaJackson
item.description:
I want to connect mangoh to the GCE hosting server. Although, I have not opted for the conventional GCE hosting server. Instead, I decided to go with the managed Google cloud web hosting server which is managed by cloudways. As, I don’t want to stuck in the management of cloud server. Usually it only take minutes to integrate any application. But, I am a bit concern about mangoh Air vantage with GCE. As, I don’t have any clue on how to do it.
